original_text: So Manoah took a kid with a meat offering, and offered it upon a rock unto the Lord: and the angel did wonderously; and Manoah and his wife looked on.
korean_text: 이에 마노아가 염소 새끼와 소제물을 가져다가 바위 위에서 여호와께 드리매 이적이 일어난지라 마노아와 그의 아내가 본즉

sentences.original_text: So Manoah took a kid with a meat offering
and offered it upon a rock unto the Lord
and Manoah and his wife looked on
